column8: S&P; to recordsUS STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Microsoft leads Wall St to fresh record highsUS STOCKS-Microsoft helps Wall St to another day of record highsUPDATE 2-France orders Microsoft to stop collecting excessive user dataFrance orders Microsoft to stop collecting excessive user data BRUSSELS The French data protection authority on Wednesday ordered Microsoft Corp to stop collecting excessive data on users of its Windows 10 operating system and serving them personalized ads without their consent.  France orders Microsoft to stop collecting excessive user data BRUSSELS The French data protection authority on Wednesday ordered Microsoft Corp to stop collecting excessive data on users of its Windows 10 operating system and serving them personalized ads without their consent. * Microsoft ordered to stop tracking Windows users without consentFrance orders Microsoft to stop collecting excessive user data BRUSSELS The French data protection authority on Wednesday ordered Microsoft Corp to stop collecting excessive data on users of its Windows 10 operating system and serving them personalized ads without their consent.
